thread.section_title: Lovestruck Invitations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lovestruck Invitations | lovestruckinvitations.com.au
thread.title: Llewelyn Fleming
thread.title_full: Lovestruck Invitations reviewed by Llewelyn Fleming

author: Llewelyn Fleming
title: Llewelyn Fleming
text:
I was very happy with the service I received - I asked lots of questions prior to ordering and they were answered promptly.
They did a great job of altering our chosen invitation to include a photo.
Quality of invites is really good.
Delivery was quick once order made and arrived very nicely boxed.
Will be using again for ceremony booklets.
